text: there is no formal mechanism. I'd like that we could surface FAQs from the chatter, but to do that effectively really demands crowd sourced effort

note also that there's a recommendation that people post to StackOverflow because that's likely the best platform for crowdsourcing Q&A that ensures (to a great degree) a certain level of consolidation and weeding out obviously unhelpful questions and answers, etc.
Okay, thanks, <@U184J2R7S> asked me about it ... I suppose responders could take it upon themselves to see if it's doc-ed correctly and open a JIRA issue if it isn't.
